DNSZoneImpl
public interface DNSZone
extends DNSComponent

An interface that defines a DNS Zone.

Method Detail

replaceBinding

DNSBindingIP replaceBinding(DNSBindingIP binding)
Replaces a new binding object as child of this component. If it is not present it is just added. We gave it an attribute equal to its name.

Parameters:
binding - A binding data object that replaces/adds.
Returns:
The old binding with the same name or null.

writeSOARecord

void writeSOARecord(java.io.File dir,
                    boolean overwrite)
                    throws DNSException
Dumps to a file the corresponding SOA record.

Parameters:
dir - A directory where to write the record.
overwrite - True if we overwrite existing files.
Throws:
DNSException - if an error occurs
